
=========================
Python Password Manager
=========================

How to use
==========

how to install ::

   $ python setup.py install

create a new file ::

   $ pwm /PATH/TO/FILE -n
   master key>
   # type master key (Don't forget it)

   # vim by default will be launched
   # so edit it

rewrite a new file ::

   $ pwm /PATH/TO/FILE -r
   # same as creating a new file

even if you open the file, it's encrypted
